metadata.dc:title: How to Make Lemonade
metadata.dc:creator: Beyonce, 1981-, aut
metadata.dc:subject: Beyoncé, 1981-
Popular music--2011-2020.
African American women in popular culture
metadata.dc:description: The 600+ page hardcover book includes hundreds of never-before-seen photos from the making of LEMONADE, and shows the inspiration and themes behind some of the film’s most provocative and cryptic moments. The foreword is written by Dr. Michael Eric Dyson with poetry by Warsan Shire. Beyoncé’s personal writing and lyrics are interwoven throughout the book.
